titles.title: Community-Supported Agriculture Promotion Act
To amend the Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008 to establish a community-supported agriculture promotion program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

bill.summary:
2/9/2012--Introduced. Community-Supported Agriculture Promotion Act - Amends the Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008 to direct the Secretary of Agriculture (USDA) to carry out a Community-Supported Agriculture Promotion program to promote community-supported agriculture.
Provides Commodity Credit Corporation (CCC) funding for the program through FY2018.
